name: HDR: High Dynamic Range
description:
HDR - High Dynamic Range is currently in Alpha. Please leave us any feedback you have in our community section or follow us on Twitter @bigwhackstudios

Description: HDR is a retro-futuristic shooter that harkens back to the FPS games of old. Take control of hired gun D1-GT on her mission to destroy the sinister Osiris Corporation.

Key Features:

  • Use the Cryo Blaster to create pillars of ice for platforming, or use it to take cover.
  • Ignite fuel lines and other explosives with the Flare Gun to progress through the Osiris Tower.
  • Use the Arc Gun to control circuitry and fry your opponents.
  • It's all about Power: Utilize D1-GT's stored energy to unleash each weapon's special attack!
  • Dodge your foes with D1-GT's dash ability!

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Jumping - Spacebar
  • Fire - Left Mouse
  • Alt Fire - Right Mouse
  • Interact - E
  • Swap Weapons - Scroll Wheel
  • Select Gun - 1-3
  • Select Sword - F
  • Left Shift - Dash
  • Open Debug Menu - ` (Requires Cheats enabled in the options)

Disclaimer: HDR: High Dynamic Range is a student production being shared for instructional purposes.

HDR is currently only tested with a Mouse and Keyboard.
